pageContext.description: Trident on faces below ridge. Blade notched at edge.
pageContext.patina: Dark green patina, a little worn.
pageContext.other: Grid reference appears to be - SO 63206 32563,3 cross section drawings of palstave on reverse.,Trident appears much more crisply made in Evan's fig than in drawing.,Stop fairly well pronounced, very short side ridges below stop.,Flanges taper to septum just below butt.,Loop is intact and is quite long. Centred a bit below stop.,Edge tips flared, edge fairly crescent shaped.
pageContext.publications: Evans, Anc. Br. hups, p. 90, Fig. 78.
pageContext.collection: Ashmolean Museum, Oxford - Evans Colln. 1927.2582.,(W.P. Hooper, Ross) -
